name: Crabyon
description:
Crab loves to paint but he can only move horizontally. Help crab paint his drawings by pressing Left or Right click to paint with one of the crayons. You can also paint with both to combine the colors!

Painting doesn't have to be perfect, Crab will be proud with 90% or more accuracy!

This game is an entry for the Mini Game Jam 111 with theme Colors and limitation "You are your own enemy"

My interpratation for the theme was that Crab's objective was to paint but his restricted movement is an obstacle to him to paint correctly, therefore "he is his own enemy" in what he wants to achieve.
